translated: The Lotus-Lady’s Chapter🔽The Shorter Seduction Jātaka
“When the water is rising,🔽coming yourself by your own psychic power,
having gone to the place of union,
you sink in the great ocean.
The great illusion of the whirlpool,
the disturbance of the spiritual life,
whether out of desire or for money,
like a fire that has been lit,

analyzed: khippam anudahanti nanti 🔽cūḍapa lobhana jātakam tatiya
translated: quickly burn them down.”🔽The Shorter Seduction Jātaka (3rd of the medium length)
